input.sentences: there were many interesting things there .
i did not know what some of them were .
there were a lot of notes and descriptions .
afterward we left to grab something to eat .
output.sentences: We went to a museum and saw a replica spaceship.
We then saw someone who was part of the military who had passed away.
Around the corner we saw large spaceships hanging from the ceiling.
There were interesting descriptions on them.
We read each and every one as we walked through the museum.
